frontmatter.title: Dancing in Shackles Caused by an Unupgradable Apache Kafka
frontmatter.description: a story about how to get a hack solution to work around a Apache Kafka bug when its upgrade is blocked by the Java version and the official solution is not available.

frontmatter.title: My Remarkable First Contribution on Public Github
frontmatter.description: happy to get my bug fix to R package urltools merged.

frontmatter.description: Apache Spark is a well designed and efficient data processing engine to replace the traditional MapReduce.
